column1: Uchi////We had a birthday party for my sister-in-law with 14 people. I like sushi but only particular fish such as salmon
column4: and mostly cooked things. I was very excited to be adventurous and try new things. Everything we ordered
column5: I tried and with the exception of one item
column6: I enjoyed all of it. It was fun to trust a high quality restaurant to try new things.
